summary: This is an email forwarded by Mark Uralgin, originally sent by Mark Epstein to Stacey Richman on September 22, 2021. The email subject is 'JE2' and contains a brief description of photos depicting a clean, hemmed noose with no signs of being cut, tied, or stained.

persons.name: Mark Uralgin
persons.context: Appears as the person forwarding an email about 'JE2' photos. The email address suffix suggests an affiliation (afaffil).

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Sent the original email describing photos of a noose related to 'JE2' to Stacey Richman.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Was the recipient of Mark Epstein's email describing the noose photos. Likely an attorney given the context.

connections.description: Mark Epstein sent an email to Stacey Richman containing observations about photos of a noose.
Mark Uralgin forwarded an email originally sent by Mark Epstein.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding noose photos
events.description: Mark Epstein emails Stacey Richman with observations about photos showing a clean, hemmed noose with no signs of being cut, tied to anything, or stained by skin secretions.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain discussing photos related to 'JE2', likely referring to Jeffrey Epstein.
The photos are described as showing a 'clean noose with hemmed edge' that was 'not cut' and had 'no indication (creases) that it was tied to anything'.
The email notes there were 'no stains from skin secretions' on the noose.
The correspondence occurred on September 22, 2021, well after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
